From Wilderness to Workplace: Finding Purpose and Power Through Lifelong Learning
From Wilderness to Workplace: Finding Purpose and Power Through Lifelong Learning
“These programmes…are more than technical certifications – they're fundamental operating systems for professional effectiveness.”
-- Eltian Chen, Graduate of (SCTP) Programme for the Lean Six Sigma Champion and Operational Excellence Manager
Lean and Six Sigma, Career Growth and Transition

The silence of unemployment can be deafening. For Eltian, that silence stretched into a “wilderness year” – a period where carefully constructed professional identities crumbled, leaving him face-to-face with fundamental questions of value and purpose. Each morning in Singapore began with the same dispiriting ritual: tea in hand, the endless scroll through job listings, each rejection blurring into the next.

It was during one of these quiet mornings, in the sanctuary-turned-prison of his room, that a pattern emerged. Across diverse industries and seemingly unrelated roles, one qualification kept appearing: Lean Six Sigma. Initially, it was a tactical decision, another credential to desperately add to a wilting CV. But as Eltian delved deeper, a profound realization dawned. He wasn’t just seeking another certificate; he was yearning for a fundamental reset in his approach to professional challenges.

Having already experienced the transformative power of the Design Innovation SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme (SCTP) from Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), Eltian had gained invaluable frameworks for creative problem-solving and a deep understanding of user-centered design, all underpinned by analytical rigor. The Lean Six Sigma Champion and Operational Excellence Manager SCTP offered by SITLEARN represented a natural and exciting expansion of his professional toolkit. These weren't about filling gaps; they were about building a robust and versatile foundation.
“Perhaps most unexpectedly, the programmes created bridges between my seemingly disconnected experiences.”
The Power of Community and Connection

"These programmes," Eltian reflects, "are more than technical certifications – they're fundamental operating systems for professional effectiveness." He emphasizes the power of structured approaches to problem-solving, the clarity brought by analytical frameworks for decision-making, and the crucial discipline of implementation that these programmes cultivate. These are not skills confined to a specific industry; they are universally applicable, valuable regardless of career trajectory.

Eltian also discovered an unexpected benefit: community. “During unemployment, professional isolation had been among the most painful aspects – the loss of daily exchanges with colleagues who shared common challenges,” he shares. The SITLEARN programmes provided a space to connect with other professionals, share experiences, and build a supportive network. “Breaks became mini-mentoring sessions as unemployed and employed shared personal job-seeking journeys and work implementation war stories and offered insights from their own experiences,” Eltian recalls.

Eltian’s journey underscores the power of proactively investing in oneself, especially during times of uncertainty. Instead of succumbing to the inertia of unemployment, he chose to arm himself with in-demand skills and methodologies. The complementary nature of Design Innovation and Lean Six Sigma proved to be a game-changer. "The intersections between different approaches create unique insights that distinguish you professionally," he explains. The ability to seamlessly transition between creative exploration and rigorous analysis – knowing when each approach is most effective – is a versatility increasingly prized in today's complex organizational landscapes.

Moreover, the programs helped Eltian weave together the seemingly disparate threads of his professional past. “Perhaps most unexpectedly, the programmes created bridges between my seemingly disconnected experiences,” he says. Skills honed in the controlled chaos of hawker operations gained structure and terminology, while the disciplined approach to procedures from his police service found new expression in process documentation techniques.
“The contrast between my job search before and after these programmes could hardly be more stark.”
Transformed Job Search and Real-World Application

The impact of the SITLEARN programmes extended beyond knowledge acquisition; it fundamentally transformed Eltian's job search experience. "The contrast between my job search before and after these programmes could hardly be more stark," he states. “Before certification, I spent months securing even preliminary interviews. Afterward, I received job offers within weeks, including one from a luxury conglomerate company I'd previously considered well beyond my reach,” he adds. Eltian attributes this change to his newfound ability to articulate his value proposition with clarity and confidence, demonstrating structured analytical thinking and problem-solving methodologies to potential employers.

Eltian has also successfully applied his learnings in his work. He speaks of developing what colleagues jokingly call his "process" – an instinctive ability to identify improvement opportunities. Beyond efficiency gains, he finds it most rewarding to witness a cultural shift as colleagues adopt these methodologies. “While some improvements show in metrics, others appear in the quality of conversations – the shift from opinion-based debates to evidence-driven discussions about process performance,” he notes.
Eltian Chen at workplace (Photo: Eltian Chen)
Words of Wisdom and a Call to Action

For those currently navigating their own “wilderness years” or feeling stuck in their professional journeys, Eltian offers this powerful insight: these programmes from SITLEARN offer more than just immediate employability. They provide durable skills that withstand economic fluctuations and industry shifts. They equip you with both the practical tools needed for Monday morning and the strategic frameworks for long-term career growth.

His only regret? Not discovering these methodologies earlier. They haven't just opened doors to employment; they have fundamentally reshaped how he creates value and navigates the intricacies of organizations. In a professional world increasingly defined by change and ambiguity, the structured approaches to improvement offered by SITLEARN provide not just techniques, but a bedrock for continuous adaptation and growth, no matter what tomorrow may bring.
If you, like Eltian, find yourself at a professional crossroads, consider the transformative power of continuous learning.
